replies.author: skyinr
replies.txt_content:
有个方块在加载的时候出问题了坐标在-196，56，-241
可以删掉地图文件夹里的region文件夹的-1，-1文件来解决（建议先备份）
Location: World: (-196,56,-241), Chunk: (at 12,3,15 in -13,-16; contains blocks -208,0,-256 to -193,255,-241), Region: (-1,-1; contains chunks -32,-32 to -1,-1, blocks -512,0,-512 to -1,255,-1)
